description: Minimal source-of-truth command manifest for primary TiltCheck bot (trust, safety, moderation, gameplay).
principles: Non-custodial tipping features should live in dedicated JustTheTip bot to reduce overlap.
Admin / experimental commands removed from public surface for clarity.
Promo & blocklist moderation retained; could combine into single 'promo' command later (roadmap).

commands.name: trust
commands.description: View casino or user trust scores; explain scoring.

commands.name: vault
commands.description: Lock and manage time-locked vaults to prevent tilt spending.

commands.name: scan
commands.description: Scan a URL for suspicious patterns.

commands.name: blockdomain
commands.description: Block a domain from promo submissions.

commands.name: unblockdomain
commands.description: Unblock a domain for promo submissions.

commands.name: blockpattern
commands.description: Block a URL pattern from promo submissions.

commands.name: unblockpattern
commands.description: Unblock a URL pattern for promo submissions.

commands.name: submitpromo
commands.description: Submit a free spin or promo link for review.

removalCandidates.name: justthetip
removalCandidates.reason: Duplicate tipping surface; migrate users to dedicated bot.

removalCandidates.name: airdrop
removalCandidates.reason: Tipping feature should live solely in JustTheTip bot.

removalCandidates.name: tiltcheck
removalCandidates.reason: Admin / diagnostic experimental command cluttering public surface.

roadmap: Consolidate promo moderation into single 'promo' with subcommands.
Move trivia to its own gameplay bot if scope expands.
